title: Byteman 4.0.20 has been released
content: Byteman 4.0.20 is now available from the and from the . It is the latest update release for use on all JDK9+ runtimes up to and including JDK20.    Byteman 4.0.20 is a maintenance release which enables Byteman to be used with JDK20 releases. It also contains two small bug fixes. More details are provided in the and the latest .
